tips.tip.no_tips: No tips have been loaded. Please review the configurations.
tips.tip.undead_damage: Undead mobs like Skeletons are damaged by health potions and healed by damage potions.
tips.tip.poison_immune: Zombies, Skeletons, and Spiders are all immune to poison damage.
tips.tip.witch_conversion: 村民被閃電擊中會變成女巫。
tips.tip.four_eggs: Hatching chicken eggs can spawn four chickens on very rare occasions.
tips.tip.nether_lava: 岩漿在地獄會流得更快。
tips.tip.east: The Sun, Moon, and Stars all move towards the east.
tips.tip.swamp_slime: 滿月時，史萊姆可以在沼澤中生成。
tips.tip.deflect_ghast_fireballs: You can deflect Ghast Fireballs by attacking them.
tips.tip.shulker_armor: 界伏蚌開殼時受到的傷害更高。
tips.tip.arthropods: Spiders, Silverfish, Bees, and Endermites all take damage from Bane of Arthropods.
tips.tip.fossils: Large fossils are buried under swamps and deserts.
tips.tip.crouch_blocks: Sneaking/Crouching will prevent you from falling off the side of blocks.
tips.tip.smoke_bees: Placing a Campfire beneath a Bee Nest will make those Bees passive.
tips.tip.lava_fuel: 熔岩桶可以當作熔爐的燃料。
tips.tip.wooden_tool_fuel: Old Wooden tools can be used as fuel in the Furnace.
tips.tip.scrap_nuggets: Gold and Iron tools/armor can be smelted into nuggets.
tips.tip.dog_health: The lower a dog's tail, the less health they have left.
tips.tip.dog_rotten_flesh: You can heal your dogs by feeding them Rotten Flesh.
tips.tip.lure_animals: You can lure animals into following you by holding a food they like in your main hand or off hand.
tips.tip.cooked_drops: Animals killed by fire damage will sometimes drop cooked food.
tips.tip.nether_sponge: Wet sponges will immediately dry when placed in the nether.
tips.tip.shulker_golem: Shulkers are considered a type of Golem by the game code.
tips.tip.note_block_instrument: The instrument of a Note Block is determined by the block underneath it.
tips.tip.zombie_armor: Zombies have two base points of armor, even when they are not wearing any.
tips.tip.undead_helmet: Undead mobs will not burn in daylight if they are wearing a helmet.
tips.tip.iron_golem_heal: Iron Golems can be healed by giving them iron ingots.
tips.tip.turtle_shell: Turtles don't drop their shell when they die, but only when their babies grow adult.
tips.tip.animal_growing: 你可以通過餵養小動物來加速牠們的成長。
tips.tip.blaze_snowball: 烈焰使者是唯一會被雪球傷害的攻擊型生物。
tips.tip.biome_bonemeal: Using bone meal on grass blocks, gives you different flowers depending on the biome you're in.
tips.tip.biome_fishing: Fishing in a Jungle can give you different items compared to fishing in other biomes.
tips.tip.fishing_resources: 釣魚是獲取高級附魔書的好方法。
tips.tip.boat_jump: By placing a boat in lava you can make a temporary platform.
tips.tip.creeper_cat: Creepers are afraid of cats and will run away from them.
tips.tip.water_grass: Water is a great way to quickly break grass patches and get seeds.
tips.tip.gravity_torch: If you quickly put a torch under blocks affected by gravity, they will break in chain.
tips.tip.string_wool: String can be crafted in a 2x2 to make wool.
tips.tip.barrel: Barrels are more efficient than chests; they don't require a block overhead and can be put together infinitely.
tips.tip.job_site_dimension: Villagers lose their job site when changing dimensions.
tips.tip.villager_sweat: Villagers sweat when trying to trade with them during a raid.
tips.tip.wandering_invis: 流浪商人會在晚上的時候喝隱形藥水。
tips.tip.baby_panda_slimeball: Baby Pandas have a 0.1% chance to drop a slimeball after they sneeze.
tips.tip.fortress_triangulation: You can triangulate stronghold locations by summoning eyes of ender from two different locations and tracking where they intersect.
tips.tip.creeper_drops_disc: If a Skeleton's or Stray's arrow kills a Creeper, the Creeper drops a random music disc (excluding the nether music disc).
tips.tip.mooshroom_lightning: A red mooshroom will become a brown mooshroom, and a brown mooshroom will become a red one, when struck by lightning.
tips.tip.bed_explode: Trying to sleep in other dimensions will end poorly.
tips.tip.fall_damage_blocks: 某些方塊例如水或是乾草堆可以降低掉落傷害。
tips.tip.bed_respawn: 在床上睡覺可以設置重生點。
tips.tip.ore_tiers: Some ores have a minimum required pickaxe tier to mine them.
tips.tip.sponge_bucket: Wet Sponge can be dried in a furnace by cooking it. If there is an empty bucket in the fuel slot the bucket will catch the water!
tips.tip.coarse_to_dirt: Coarse Dirt can be converted into normal dirt using a hoe.
tips.tip.enderman_blocks: 終界使者可以移動方塊，像是泥土、沙子、甚至TNT！
tips.tip.dragon_blocks: 鐵柵欄、終界石及黑曜石不會被終界龍摧毀。
tips.tip.piglin_repellent: Piglins are scared of soul fire blocks including the Soul Torch and Soul Lantern
gui.tips.list.title: Tips List
